author: Sandra L. Bittinger "SLB Scorpio 3"

review: I think it and its companion, Fire TV Box, are great.  Easy to use and excellent performance.  I took off 1/2 star because I wish it had some other Apps that i use on my PC like DRAMAFEVER.  We Should be able to load any Android App easily on it.  I have side-loaded some other apps using Apps2Fire from the Amazon App Store.  However, most do not work correctly even though they load fine.  A suggestion to make the experience of using these devices more comfortable would be if the remote had a  limited learning capability.  That is, the ability to add some basic functions like turn TV on/off and raise/lower volume.  The voice command feature on the Fire TV Box works just great.  I am highly pleased with these products.
